title: V2 tags / known tag issues
body:
From: https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/pull/1018

- [ ] unexpected behavior: if the tag exists, and the user uses the search and hits enter it (instead of selecting it), then it fails
feels like something with vuetify combobox
(Does not apply to new tag creation, or normal selection)

- [ ]  thoughts on deleting or editing tag names in general (not in Apply case which is already covered, but like global admin of tags)

- [ ] should you be able to inherit tags from a dataset?
e.g. at time of creation it automatically adds tags to task based on attached dataset tags?
and/or how those tags "pass through" or get used...
I still think it's good to have tags on both but need to think about it more
- [ ] some random console errors (more on vuetify )

- [ ] TESTS....

- [ ] max width for tags display e.g. in Dataset view

- [ ] docs updates
For end users, e.g. explaining how tags cross cut stuff, tags aren't Schema. it's for working within stuff etc

- [x] leave off on making it generic for other objects or not 
From https://github.com/diffgram/diffgram/pull/1018

--> Discussion on this, is better to make tables concrete and functions generic for now.
In future can make generic table if needed, but for now get performance, validation, including "Product" level considerations, vs just randomly being able to add tags to any DB object independently of Product thought.

- [ ] Visual design of tags sometimes not very good. We prefer github style
Can of worms since integrated with so much other formatting, and selection contexts, etc.
